text:
Hi all, I have a local development setup with webpack. The problem is that when I build the assets and upload them to HubSpot, HubSpot CLI throws an error with validating JavaScript and doesn't upload it. The error is sth like this:
```[ERROR] Error validating template.
[ERROR] line 2: Error parsing 'const r=t[0]?`on key "${t[0]}"```
I see that it doesn't like `const` because if I compile it to ES5 it works. But I don't want to compile it to ES5 (we don't need to support very old browsers and we don't want to bring in a lot of polyfills). Any way to fix this?
